Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Feedback from teachers will always be better than GenAI, GenAI lacks the social and emotional awareness a real person does. Whilst academic writing does not necessarily use this awareness the teacher has a better idea of the assignment, the content and the requirements to grade it effectively.
